name: automarket-quito
description: Pipeline Aplicativo - E-commerce Vehicular para Quito

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit --prefix backend && npm run test:unit --prefix frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix backend && npm run format --prefix frontend
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check --prefix backend && npm run format:check --prefix frontend
scripts.docs:generate: npm run docs:generate --prefix backend && npm run docs:generate --prefix frontend
scripts.security:check: npm audit && npm audit --prefix backend && npm audit --prefix frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean --prefix backend && npm run clean --prefix frontend

author: AutoMarket Quito Team
